Question: Shenzhen Pkcell Battery Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Pkcell Battery Co., Ltd

Product 1

- Alkaline & Carbon Battery
- Rechargeable Battery
- Charger
- Alkaline Button Cell
- Lithium Button Cell
- Li MnO2 Battery
- LiSoCl2 Battery
- Li-ion Battery
- Ni-Mh/Ni-Cd rechargeable batteries
- Super heavy duty batteries
- Cordless phone batteries
- Power banks
- Industrial area of 28,000 square meters
- R&D engineering team with over 100 people
- ISO9001 and ISO14001 certified
- UL, IEC62133, CB, CE, RoHS, UN38.3, and MSDS certified
- Global sales network covering Asia, Europe, America, and Africa
- 20+ years of battery manufacturing experience
- 10-year warranty
- High drain batteries
- Exported products to more than 30 countries
